mapper.insert: insert into shop ( shop_id, shop_name, shop_img, shop_addr1, food_category, shop_call, shop_content, shop_min_price, shop_open_hour, shop_close_hour, shop_close_day, shop_cdate, shop_mdate, owner_id, shop_addr2 ) values ( null, #{shop_name}, #{shop_img}, #{shop_addr1}, #{food_category}, #{shop_call}, #{shop_content}, #{shop_min_price}, #{shop_open_hour}, #{shop_close_hour}, #{shop_close_day}, default, default, #{owner_id}, #{shop_addr2} )
mapper.update: UPDATE shop SET shop_status = CASE WHEN shop_status = '휴무일' THEN '휴무일' WHEN DAYNAME(CONVERT_TZ(NOW(), 'UTC', 'Asia/Seoul')) = shop_close_day THEN '휴무일' WHEN TIME('23:59:59') > TIME(CONVERT_TZ(NOW(), 'UTC', 'Asia/Seoul')) AND TIME(CONVERT_TZ(NOW(), 'UTC', 'Asia/Seoul')) > TIME(shop_open_hour) THEN '영업중' WHEN TIME(shop_close_hour) > TIME(CONVERT_TZ(NOW(), 'UTC', 'Asia/Seoul')) THEN '영업중' ELSE '영업전' END
mapper.select:
SELECT s.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM menu WHERE shop_id = s.shop_id) AS menu_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reviews r INNER JOIN orders o ON o.orders_id = r.orders_id WHERE o.shop_id = s.shop_id) AS reviews_count, (SELECT AVG(r.reviews_rating) FROM reviews r INNER JOIN orders o ON o.orders_id = r.orders_id WHERE o.shop_id = s.shop_id) AS shop_rating, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ceoreview c INNER JOIN reviews r ON c.reviews_id = r.reviews_id INNER JOIN orders o ON o.orders_id = r.orders_id WHERE o.shop_id = s.shop_id) AS ceoreview_count FROM shop s
AND food_category = #{food_category}
AND shop_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
ORDER BY
shop_id ASC
shop_rating DESC
reviews_count DESC
shop_min_price ASC
